name: OneSignal
headline: Engage customers through personalized omni-channel messaging
description:
OneSignal is the leading omnichannel customer engagement solution, powering personalized customer journeys across mobile and web push notifications, in-app messaging, SMS, and email. Our easy-to-use interface empowers content creators to focus on quality user engagement instead of complex implementation.

Our powerful platform enables over a million businesses to deliver 10 billion messages daily and 1 in 7 new apps launches using OneSignal! We support companies in 140 countries, including Zynga, USA Today, Bitcoin.com, Upwork, Tribune, and many more - from startups and small businesses just getting off the ground to established companies communicating with millions of customers.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:messaging; industry:marketing; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: George Deglin, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Technical Founder & CEO of OneSignal (YC S11 and YCG S20).

founders.name: Long Vo, Founder/COO
founders.description: Co-Founder and COO at OneSignal(YC S11). Previously Co-Founder and Art/Creative Director at Gaia Online, Director/Senior Producer UDON Entertainment.

# Maximize engagement, minimize churn
## Push notifications, email, SMS, Live Activities, and in-app messaging to develop engaged and loyal customers
[Get started now](https://onesignal.com/<https:/dashboard.onesignal.com/signup>) [Talk to sales](https://onesignal.com/</contact>)
G2 G2 Leader in Marketing Automation Software
[ ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/dashboard.onesignal.com/signup>)
Trusted by over a million businesses 
  * Logo eventbrite gray
  * Logo whole foods gray
  * Logo zynga gray
  * Logo bitcoin gray
  * Logo zenni gray


  * Logo nexstar gray
  * Logo dhl gray
  * Logo royal caribbean gray
  * Logo abinbev gray
  * Logo peapod gray


##  Everything you’re looking for in one platform 
Omnichannel customer engagement has never been more important – or this easy 
### [Journeys Seamlessly automate messaging across channels with our drag-and-drop workflow builder - all with no code required ![Journeys](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/journeys>)
### [Mobile push notifications Be the first thing customers see when they pick up their phones and the last tap before lights out ![Mobile push notifications](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/mobile-push>)
### [Web push notifications Stay in front of customers even after they leave your site and bring them back with real-time news, offers, and updates ![Web push notifications](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/web-push>)
### [Email Deliver on-brand and mobile-responsive transactional and promotional emails that look great on every device ![Email](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/email>)
### [In-app messaging Inspire action through in-app banners, modals, and multi-screen carousels - no app store approvals needed ![In app messaging](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/in-app>)
### [SMS Communicate with customers who don’t have your app with one of the highest engagement channels available ![Sms](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/sms>)
### [Live Activities Display custom app experiences directly on the Lock Screen with real-time updates lasting up to 8 hours ![Live activities](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/live-activities>)
##  Unblocking marketers so you can drive ROI 
Marketing teams are being asked to do increasingly more with less support. OneSignal is here to help 
344% 
Increase in engagement through personalized content 
36% 
Greater engagement from using more than one messaging channel 
24% 
Higher purchase rates by sending onboarding messages 
14% 
Improvement in average 30-day retention for apps using Journeys 
###  Operate autonomously 
Connect with your audience throughout their lifecycle with our low-maintenance platform. No need for ongoing engineering support 
###  Be more efficient 
Waste less time context-switching and consolidate channels into one platform for omnichannel customer lifecycle messaging 
###  Drive measurable ROI 
Onboard, engage, reactivate, and retain your users to drive higher LTV, retention, and revenue for your business 
##  Get started today for free with our platform 
From a Free Plan to a totally customized annual contract, OneSignal is built to scale with your business 
[ Get started now ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/dashboard.onesignal.com/signup>) [ Talk to sales ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/contact>)
##  Tailored solutions for your industry 
We serve businesses across virtually every vertical — these are just a few that love OneSignal: 
### [Gaming Upgrade casual players to paying pros with an irresistible engagement loop and reactivation campaigns ![Gaming](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/gaming>)
### [News & media Increase traffic, impressions, and ad revenue with breaking news alerts and trending stories that are first-to-phone ![Media](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/media>)
### [eCommerce Generate revenue through product drops, promos, in-stock alerts, and abandoned cart reminders ![Ecommerce](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/ecommerce>)
### [Mobile apps Digitally transform your strategy for a mobile-first world to grow, engage, and retain your app users ![Mobile apps](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/mobile>)
### [Financial Be the first to tip off users to critical updates, limited-time opportunities, and market movements ![Financial](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/financial>)
##  Measuring our success by our customers’ success 
See what they have to say about us 
> “Here in the gaming industry, push notifications are the best retention tool and the best way to return players to the game. And that’s why we love to work with OneSignal.”
> ![Ishai Kerem](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png)

> CRM and Monetization Manager, Beach Bum Games

> ![David Ting](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png)

> CTO & Global General Manager, Zenni Optical

> Medium Enterprise Internet Software & Services Company

> ![Ryan Lawrence](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png)
> **Ryan Lawrence**
> Founder, Betmate
> [](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/case-studies/betmate>)
> 33% 
> Average increase in ability to engage audience using OneSignal reported across survey respondents. 
> ![Survey of OneSignal Users](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png)
> **Survey of OneSignal Users**
> Conducted by UserEvidence
> [](https://onesignal.com/<https:/app.userevidence.com/assets/3214OULQ>)
##  The developer’s choice for mobile messaging 
Our founders are developers at heart, prioritizing clear documentation, reliable APIs, and robust SDKs 
[Android](https://onesignal.com/<#android>) [iOS](https://onesignal.com/<#ios>) [Flutter](https://onesignal.com/<#flutter>) [React Native](https://onesignal.com/<#reactnative>) [Unity](https://onesignal.com/<#unity>)
Select SDK Android iOS Flutter React Native Unity
```

// Initialize SDK during app bootstrapping 


package com.onesignal.sample.android


import android.app.Application


import com.onesignal.OneSignal


class MainApplication : Application() {


  override fun onCreate() {


    super.onCreate()


    OneSignal.initWithContext(this, "APP_ID")


  }


}

```
[Build for Android](https://onesignal.com/<https:/documentation.onesignal.com/docs/android-sdk-setup>)
```

import SwiftUI


import DotEnv


import OneSignalFramework


@main


struct MyApp: App {


  @UIApplicationDelegateAdaptor(AppDelegate.self) var appDelegate


  var body: some Scene {


    WindowGroup {


      ContentView()


    }


  }


}


class AppDelegate: UIResponder, UIApplicationDelegate, OSInAppMessageLifecycleListener {


  func application(_ application: UIApplication, didFinishLaunchingWithOptions launchOptions: [UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey: Any]? = nil) -> Bool {


    let env = DotEnv(withFile: ".env")


    env.load()


    OneSignal.initialize(env.get("ONESIGNAL_APP_ID"), withLaunchOptions: launchOptions)


    return true


  }


}

```
[Build for iOS](https://onesignal.com/<https:/documentation.onesignal.com/docs/ios-sdk-setup>)
```

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';


import 'package:onesignal_flutter/onesignal_flutter.dart';


import 'package:flutter_application_la/live_actiivties_manager.dart';


void main() {


 runApp(const MyApp());


}


class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {


 const MyApp({super.key});


 @override


 Widget build(BuildContext context) {


  LiveActivitiesManager.register();


  OneSignal.initialize("<<YOUR_APP_ID>>");


  OneSignal.Notifications.requestPermission(true);


  return MaterialApp(


   title: 'Flutter Demo',


   theme: ThemeData(


    colorScheme: ColorScheme.fromSeed(seedColor: Colors.deepPurple),


    useMaterial3: true,


   ),


   home: const MyHomePage(title: 'Flutter Demo Home Page'),


  );


 }


}

```
[Build with Flutter](https://onesignal.com/<https:/documentation.onesignal.com/docs/flutter-sdk-setup>)
```

import * as React from 'react';


import { APP_ID } from '@env'; 


import { OneSignal} from 'react-native-onesignal';


class OS extends React.Component<Props, State> {


 constructor(props: Props) {


  super(props);


  this.state = { };


 }


 async componentDidMount() {


  OneSignal.initialize(APP_ID);


 }


}

```
[Build with React Native](https://onesignal.com/<https:/documentation.onesignal.com/docs/react-native-sdk-setup>)
```

using System;


using UnityEngine;


using UnityEngine.UI;


using OneSignalSDK;


public class ExampleBehaviour : MonoBehaviour


{


  public OSConfigData configData;


  public string externalId;


  private void Start()


  {


    OneSignal.Initialize(configData.appId);


  }


  private void _userStateChanged(object sender, UserStateChangedEventArgs e) {


    // OneSignal ID and External ID are available in event state


    // e.g., `e.state.Current.OneSignalId`


  }


  public void LoginUser() {


    OneSignal.Login(externalId);


  }


  public void SetExternalIdString(string newVal) => externalId = newVal;



}

```
[Build with Unity](https://onesignal.com/<https:/documentation.onesignal.com/docs/unity-sdk-setup>)
### [SDKs Enable mobile messaging, identify users, and understand user behavior to improve your user experience ![Sdk](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/sdk>)
### [REST APIs Send messages and analyze results at scale, manage subscriptions, and build integrations ![Api](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/message-api>)
### [Webhooks Connect with your martech stack and seamlessly share message and event data ![Webhooks](https://onesignal.com/images/placeholder.png) ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/documentation.onesignal.com/docs/event-webhooks>)
##  Seamless integrations 
OneSignal works with leading tools including Analytics platforms, CDPs, Data Warehouses, CRMs, and more to help you better target and personalize your messaging–without having to duplicate your data 
[View Full Integrations Directory](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/integrations>)
[ ](https://onesignal.com/<https:/dashboard.onesignal.com/signup>)
##  Dedicated to data privacy and security 
Compliant with SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, HIPAA, [and more](https://onesignal.com/<https:/onesignal.com/privacy>)
Soc 2 Gdpr Ccpa Hipaa Data privacy framework

##  The developer’s choice for mobile messaging 
Our founders are developers at heart, prioritizing clear documentation, reliable APIs, and robust SDKs 
Android⟨44⟩ iOS⟨45⟩ Flutter⟨46⟩ React Native⟨47⟩ Unity⟨48⟩
Select SDK Android iOS Flutter React Native Unity
```

// Initialize SDK during app bootstrapping 


package com.onesignal.sample.android


import android.app.Application


import com.onesignal.OneSignal


class MainApplication : Application() {


  override fun onCreate() {


    super.onCreate()


    OneSignal.initWithContext(this, "APP_ID")


  }


}

```
Build for Android⟨49⟩
```

import SwiftUI


import DotEnv


import OneSignalFramework


@main


struct MyApp: App {


  @UIApplicationDelegateAdaptor(AppDelegate.self) var appDelegate


  var body: some Scene {


    WindowGroup {


      ContentView()


    }


  }


}


class AppDelegate: UIResponder, UIApplicationDelegate, OSInAppMessageLifecycleListener {


  func application(_ application: UIApplication, didFinishLaunchingWithOptions launchOptions: [UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey: Any]? = nil) -> Bool {


    let env = DotEnv(withFile: ".env")


    env.load()


    OneSignal.initialize(env.get("ONESIGNAL_APP_ID"), withLaunchOptions: launchOptions)


    return true


  }


}

```
Build for iOS⟨50⟩
```

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';


import 'package:onesignal_flutter/onesignal_flutter.dart';


import 'package:flutter_application_la/live_actiivties_manager.dart';


void main() {


 runApp(const MyApp());


}


class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {


 const MyApp({super.key});


 @override


 Widget build(BuildContext context) {


  LiveActivitiesManager.register();


  OneSignal.initialize("<<YOUR_APP_ID>>");


  OneSignal.Notifications.requestPermission(true);


  return MaterialApp(


   title: 'Flutter Demo',


   theme: ThemeData(


    colorScheme: ColorScheme.fromSeed(seedColor: Colors.deepPurple),


    useMaterial3: true,


   ),


   home: const MyHomePage(title: 'Flutter Demo Home Page'),


  );


 }


}

```

  }


  private void _userStateChanged(object sender, UserStateChangedEventArgs e) {


    // OneSignal ID and External ID are available in event state


    // e.g., `e.state.Current.OneSignalId`


  }


  public void LoginUser() {


    OneSignal.Login(externalId);


  }


  public void SetExternalIdString(string newVal) => externalId = newVal;



}

generated_description:
**OneSignal: The Go-To Platform for Customer Engagement**

Founded in 2011 as part of Y Combinator’s Batch S11, OneSignal has emerged as a leader in omnichannel customer engagement. Based in San Mateo, California, the company empowers businesses by providing a straightforward platform for personalized messaging across multiple channels, including push notifications, SMS, email, and in-app messaging. 

**Mission and Impact**

OneSignal's mission is simple: to help businesses engage their customers through personalized, omni-channel messaging. The platform supports over a million businesses worldwide, sending a staggering 10 billion messages every day. Not only does OneSignal make communication seamless for established companies, but it also propels the success of startups across 140 countries—from Zynga and USA Today to Bitcoin.com and Upwork.

**User-Friendly Platform**

What sets OneSignal apart? It’s the emphasis on user experience. The platform is designed for content creators, allowing them to focus on crafting quality engagement strategies without getting bogged down in complex implementations. This approach is particularly crucial in today’s fast-paced marketing landscape, where businesses need efficient tools to keep up.

**Robust Features**

OneSignal's suite of features includes:

- **Mobile Push Notifications**: Ensure you’re the first thing a user sees when they wake up.
- **Web Push Notifications**: Engage users even after they leave your site.
- **Email Services**: Create compelling, on-brand emails from anywhere.
- **In-App Messaging**: Customize users' in-app experience in real-time.
- **SMS Capabilities**: Reach customers directly on their mobile phones.
- **Live Activities**: Provide them with real-time updates directly on their lock screen.

The platform also offers advanced features like segmentation, analytics, personalization, and API integrations, making it a versatile choice for businesses across various industries such as gaming, eCommerce, media, and fintech.

**Why Choose OneSignal?**

With a team of approximately 150 dedicated employees, OneSignal is not just a service; it's a partner that helps marketers drive measurable ROI. Businesses using the platform report significant increases in engagement and retention—344% improved engagement via personalized content, 36% greater engagement from using multiple channels, and 24% higher purchase rates with onboarding messages.

The platform’s commitment to data privacy and security makes it compliant with standards like SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, and HIPAA, allowing companies to focus on their growth without compromising user trust.

**Conclusion**

In a world where customer engagement is paramount, OneSignal provides a robust, easy-to-use solution that democratizes messaging for businesses of all sizes. Whether you're a budding startup or an established enterprise, OneSignal is designed to scale with your needs.

You can learn more about OneSignal and get started with their services by visiting their website: [OneSignal](https://onesignal.com).
